metadata.title: CVE-2019-25076 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The TSS (Tuple Space Search) algorithm in Open vSwitch 2.x through 2.17.2and 3.0.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (delays oflegitimate traffic) via crafted packet data that requires excessiveevaluation time within the packet classification algorithm for the MegaFlowcache, aka a Tuple Space Explosion (TSE) attack.

criterions.comment: openvswitch: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
